chapters.title: Introduction: Swift for Complete Beginners
chapters.subtitle: If you want to learn the language all at once before you start making apps, this is for you.

chapters.title: Project 1: Storm Viewer
chapters.subtitle: Get started coding in Swift by making an image viewer app and learning key concepts.

chapters.title: Project 2: Guess the Flag
chapters.subtitle: Make a game using UIKit, and learn about integers, buttons, colors and actions.

chapters.title: Project 3: Social Media
chapters.subtitle: Let users share to Facebook and Twitter by modifying project 1.
